TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Cihafayan, title = Cihafayan, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cihafayan} }

S.FORM: Cihafayan Itiniay i Fenglin Cen no Hualien ko Cihafayan a niyaro', 101 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 221 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 83 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 183 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 17 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 38 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis77 , Truku1 , Tayal2 , Bunun1 , roma1 . Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
